channel.title: My first app - Series - MAUI, c'est clair !
channel.description: My first app - Series - MAUI, c'est clair !

item.title: Create animations in .NET MAUI for a disco atmosphere
item.author: Jean-Emmanuel BAILLAT
item.description: In this final episode, we'll be creating animations with .NET MAUI to set the mood for a crazy night. Put on your sunglasses, because there will be flashes everywhere!

item.title: Listen to a playlist with MediaElement
item.author: Jean-Emmanuel BAILLAT
item.description: The application is great, but it would be nicer if you could change the song. Well thatâ€™s ideal because today we're integrating a music playlist!

item.title: Download an audio file in .NET MAUI
item.author: Jean-Emmanuel BAILLAT
item.description: Today, we will have a look at how to enable the user to download the music that is currently playing. We have been listening to the same song over and over, I'm sure you have been dreaming of being able to download it from the app! ðŸ˜„

item.title: Control the volume with MediaElement
item.author: Jean-Emmanuel BAILLAT
item.description: Now we are going to implement volume control! As with any good music player, we want our user to be able to turn the volume up or down as desired.

item.title: Control the playback position with MediaElement
item.author: Jean-Emmanuel BAILLAT
item.description: Let's continue with the implementation of playhead control! The idea is to be able to move to a specific frame in the track.

item.title: Play music in .NET MAUI with MediaElement
item.author: Jean-Emmanuel BAILLAT
item.description: Our application is taking shape! But it's only visual for now... In this chapter we will learn how to play music from the application!

item.title: Music player display - Volume
item.author: Jean-Emmanuel BAILLAT
item.description: We are almost done with the first big implementation phase of our main page. We'll now move on to the volume control!

item.title: Music player display - Media playback
item.author: Jean-Emmanuel BAILLAT
item.description: More and more buttons! In this chapter, we will integrate the controls for manipulating the media.

item.title: Music player display - Time tracker
item.author: Jean-Emmanuel BAILLAT
item.description: Now that the foundations of the main page are ready, we can start laying out all the controls. Let's start with the timing!

item.title: Arrange elements on a .NET MAUI page
item.author: Jean-Emmanuel BAILLAT
item.description: Before developing a new page, it is best to think about the layout of the various elements. And you'll see, it's a real architect's job!
